question: Which of the following clearly defines land ceiling?
option1: To fix a land area for irrigation purposes
option2: To fix rural land holdings at the existing level
option3: To fix urban land holdings at the existing level
option4: To fix the quantum of land held by a family
answer: To fix the quantum of land held by a family
explanation: Land ceiling implies settling maximum size of land holding that an individual/family can own. Land over and above the ceiling limit, called surplus land. This surplus land is handed over to landless laborers without any fair compensation.
